prompt:
What is an important issue facing your country right now that you think people outside your country should know about? Provide context and discuss why this issue matters to you personally or how it impacts your daily life.
My country is experiencing a significant shortage of healthcare providers, particularly doctors, nurses, and mental health professionals. This issue directly affects me because I have recently suffered from severe depression and have sought professional help from therapists and psychiatrists. The scarcity of such experts in my area has led to long waiting periods and difficulties in securing appointments with specialists.
